QueryText: QUERY ABOUT THE BROWN PLANT HOPPER INFESTATION MANAGEMENT
KCCAns: RECOMMENDED TO SPRAY LT OF IMIDACLOPRID @2ML/ML WATER AND TO DRAIN THE WATER FROM THE FIELD

QueryText: Query on schemes relating to vegetables.
KCCAns: I suggest him to contact Agriculture Development Officer and Horticulture Development Officer from his respective block.

QueryText: ASKINGABOUT THE CONTROL MEASURE FO DOWNEY MILDEW IN BITTER GOURD.
KCCAns: SUGGESTED TO SPRAY PROPINEB 70@ 20 GM/15 LT OF WATER AT 15 DAYS OF INTERVAL.

QueryText: Management of Black rot in cabbage.
KCCAns: I suggest him to spray with 2 g/lit Copper oxychloride + Streptomycin 100 ppm .Your ID 341010 .Thank you
advice to apply urea=120 gm,ssp=210 gm,mop=275 gm/plant

QueryText: QUERY REGARDING CONTROL MEASURES OF FUNGAL DISEASES IN CABBAGE
KCCAns: RECOMMENDED TO SPARY CAPTAN @ 2 GM PER LITR OF WATER

QueryText: QUERY ABOUT THE EXCESS FLOWERING BUT NO DEVELOPMENT OF FRUITS OCCURS
KCCAns: I TOLD HIM TO WAIT FOR ANOTHER INFLORESCENCE AND OBSERVE AGAIN

QueryText: ASKING CONTROL MEASURE OF ROOT ROT IN TOMATO
KCCAns: APPLY BLITOX-50 @ 2 GRAM PER LITRE OF WATER

QueryText: Management of Fruit flies in Bitter Gourd and application of micro nutrients.
KCCAns: I suggest him to spray either Rogor 30 EC or Chlorpyriphos 20 EC @ 2 ml per litre of water. For micronutrients spray Green harvest @ 2 gram per litre of water.
